# Median

Middle point of a set of ordered  numbers;  half of the values are higher than  the median, and half of the values are  lower (17). Medical certification of cause of death Describes the process of accurately  identifying the sequence of events that  lead to  death. It includes also recording  of causes that contributed to death but  were not part of the sequence that led to  death (10).
